rmi

Interface Site

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SiteGraph, SiteTree
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SiteGraphImpl, SiteTreeImpl

    public interface Site
extends java.rmi.Remote
